wpPage.title: About
wpPage.content:
This is some additional content that can be used to be displayed in the about page.

Tucked away in the creative corner of Lansdowne Mews in central Hove, Pocket Audio is a new, independent recording and production studio focusing on producing high quality sound for its clients at affordable rates. 

We seek to cater to the needs of independent bands, musicians and artists, professionally sound engineering their music and helping them to attain their creative visions.
